abilities.name: Select Ability
abilities.description: Select an ability to see its description.

abilities.name: Mulligan
abilities.description: Two times a play session, you may re-roll any roll but must accept the results of the re-roll. You can refund any resources spent on the first roll.

abilities.name: High Octane
abilities.description: You can spend 3 energy on your turn in order to take one additional action. This additional action can be an attack.

abilities.name: Triage
abilities.description: You can use an action to determine the exact health of up to three enemy targets. This can be repeated in a turn without an energy price.

abilities.name: Cheerleader
abilities.description: You can give any player a +2 bonus to their next roll. You can do this during combat as an action but you can only do this 3 times a play session out of combat.

abilities.name: Encyclopedia
abilities.description: You can attempt any skill roll even for a skill you don't possess by passing an Intelligence check first.

abilities.name: Gotta Go Fast
abilities.description: Gain an additional 2 movement speed. During successful dodges, you can jump back 2 spaces.

abilities.name: Martial Artist
abilities.description: Successful dodging gives you a free melee attack opportunity. Chance to receive Hard+ melee attack difficulty reduced.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: You can spend one action to give your ranged attack action in the same turn a +4 hit bonus. Increase Ranged

flaws.name: Select Flaw
flaws.description: Select a flaw to see its description

flaws.name: Ill-Fated
flaws.description: Three times a play session, the ZM can force you to re-roll any roll. Any resources spent on the first roll are refunded.

flaws.name: Fainthearted
flaws.description: During most combat encounters and high-stress situations, you must roll a Tenacity check. If you fail the check, you lose your first turn.

flaws.name: Clumsy
flaws.description:
You occasionally has accidents which can cause problems. 

 You can sometimes prevent this accident by spending a certain amount of resources dictated by the ZM.

flaws.name: Alcoholic
flaws.description:
Your character cannot rest unless they consume alcohol. 

 Start the game with 5 uses of alcohol.

flaws.name: Nearsighted
flaws.description: Every time you roll a critical fail, your glasses falls off. All Perception checks fail and ranged attacks receive Impossible+ difficulty until you put it back on.

flaws.name: Diabetic
flaws.description: You need to take a shot of insulin every day in order to survive. If you do not take insulin each day, you will take a third of your max health. Start the game with 3 insulin in your inventory.
